description.name: shibbep20
description.tagline: SHIBA INU bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-shib Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept SHIBA INU bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/shib receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/shib wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
